mod.name: First Items
mod.author: Dener Diegoli
mod.event:
domodlib('firstitems_config') if(getPlayerStorageValue(cid, config.storage) > 0) then return end
for _, id in ipairs(config.items) do doPlayerAddItem(cid, id, 1) end
if(getPlayerSex(cid) == PLAYERSEX_FEMALE) then doPlayerAddItem(cid, 2651, 1) else doPlayerAddItem(cid, 2650, 1) end
doAddContainerItem(doPlayerAddItem(cid, 1987, 1), 2674, 1) setPlayerStorageValue(cid, config.storage, 1)
